page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT
page.content: { EMPLOYMENT} Employment is limited because of the lack of industries so most people are either unemployed ( over 25%), self-employed tradesmen, seasonally employed in Tourism or involved in farming. Other employment is provided by an old people's home, the health centre, the butcher who runs his own abbattoir, the 3 pubs, the school. Residents find employment outside of this block at Goonhilly Earth Station, a quarry 2 miles away, 3 mini-factories, or Helston 12 miles away. Some professionals commute up to 30 miles. Fishing is no longer a viable industry and employs only a handful as the waters have been overfished by foreign fleets. A few woman are able to secure part-time employment because of Tourism.
